publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4698 Ms Sandra White: Failure to Address Gender Pay Gap—That the Parliament notes with grave concern that Scotland’s modern apprentice scheme is worsening the gender pay gap, with females on skills seekers/modern apprenticeship training earning 31% less than males on the same schemes compared to a gap of 12% for the general workforce, and calls on the Scottish government to address this issue urgently. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Shiona Baird*, Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*, Mark Ballard*, Alex Neil*, Chris Ballance*, Colin Fox*, Fiona Hyslop*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-4698 Failure to Address Gender Pay Gap (lodged on 8 August 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rosie Kane*, John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-4698 Failure to Address Gender Pay Gap (lodged on 8 August 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*, Tommy Sheridan*
